channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AL
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AL

item.title: Report X-2023100957
item.description:

  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0

  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found in QA hazmat cage DescribePack: Fiberboard was damage by a spill about 3 sq in DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in Hazmat cage

item.title: Report X-2023100622
item.description:
Report X-2023100622

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-13T18:12:55+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-02
  • City: THEODORE
  • State: AL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Hazmat found to be leaking during attempted delivery. Package was refused and brought back to the station to be processed by QA DescribePack: One of the two bottles had leaked from its cap. Cap was loose to touch DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Hazmat was doubled bagged in thick plastic as it was brought back to the facility. Hazmat was placed in damaged hazmat cage
